newsitem.title: USA: Deluxe to sell Financial Alliance unit.
newsitem.headline: Deluxe to sell Financial Alliance unit.

text.p: Deluxe Corp said on Monday it entered into an agreement to sell its Financial Alliance Processing Services Inc subsidiary to FA Holdings Inc for undisclosed terms.
Financial Alliance, based in Louisville, Ky., is a credit and debit card processing services company.
FA Holdings is a company organized by the current management of Financial Alliance and Inverness/Phoenix LLC, an investment banking company based in Greenwich, Conn.
Deluxe, which provides imprinted bank checks, said it previously agreed to divest businesses that do not fit its corporate strategy.
